title: Bug 10403 - Project creation should confirm the bin directory can be scrubbed
OB: When a user creates a new project for an existing directory structure and points the output folder at a bin directory that contains more than just .class files, the system does not confirm that the bin directory can be deleted and rebuilt.
EB: When a user creates a new project for an existing directory structure and points the output folder at a bin directory that contains more than just .class files, the system should confirm that the bin directory can be deleted and rebuilt.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:

1. Create a new project.
2. Specify an existing directory structure for the project.
3. Set the output folder to a bin directory that contains more than just .class files.
4. Proceed with project creation.
5. Check if the system confirms that the bin directory can be deleted and rebuilt.
